== What is !WikiEvidens? ==
*!WikiEvidens is a visualization and statistical tool for wikis.* It is in planning stage. Stay tuned.

<a href="http://wikipapers.referata.com/wiki/File:Wikievidens0.0.6.png"><img src="http://wikipapers.referata.com/w/images/Wikievidens0.0.6.png" width=500px/></a>

== Features ==
  * Wiki datasets *downloader*
  * Wiki XML *preprocessor*
  * Global, page-by-page, user-by-user and sample *analysis*
    * Summary
    * Activity by year, month, day of week, hour
    * Networks visualization
    * Authorship scanner
  * *Export* in several formats

== Download ==

You can download !WikiEvidens code from SVN repository: {{{svn checkout http://wikievidens.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ wikievidens-read-only}}}

== Install ==

To install !WikiEvidens you have to fulfill these requirements:
  * Mandatory: python, python-tk, python-sqlite, p7zip-full, python-matplotlib
  * Optional: python-nltk, graphviz

After installing all that, you can run !WikiEvidens like this: {{{python wegui.py}}}
